name: MinecraftRecipes(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa ask minecraft recipes how to craft a piston”
”Alexa ask minecraft recipes how to craft oak boat”
”Alexa ask minecraft recipes how to craft an enchanting table”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: minecraft recipes
des:
With this skill you can get Alexa to tell you any minecraft crafting recipe that you need. The skill is updated for all shaped and shapeless crafting recipes for minecraft 1.16.4.

Icons made by Those Icons from www.flaticon.com (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/those-icons)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
